# vImageCVImageFormat.Format.format16Gray

**Case**

A big-endian 16-bit grayscale pixel format with black equal to zero.

## Declaration

```swift
case format16Gray
```

## Monochrome format constants

- **vImageCVImageFormat.Format.format32AlphaGray**: A big-endian 16-bit grayscale with alpha pixel format with black equal to zero.
